CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 19, reads: "DATE IS SET - Miss Gloria Golden, daughter of Mr.and Mrs. Jesses Golden of 3347 Milwaukee Street, will become the bride of James Henry Grate, Sunday, Sept. 1, at Wesley Center AME Zion Church. The nuptials are scheduled for 5:30 P.M., with the Rev. Charles H. Foggie performing the rites.  The bride-elect is one of Pittsburgh's most popular beauticians. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Gloria Golden (Grate) wearing long sleeved circular patterned blouse, dark skirt, and hat with netting, posed in front of light colored background in Harris Studio
